question: Who tops in the Indian Express list of most powerful Indians?
explanation: India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi has retained the top spot on 'IE 100 2018', The List of Most Powerful Indians. PM Modi has retained the top spot as he has been the face of BJP in every election (Assembly, by-poll or civic polls) contested since 2014. UPA Chairperson Sonia Gandhi (at No. 5) is the most powerful woman on the list. Surprisingly, President Ram Nath Kovind's name has not featured in this list.
